alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 6:14PM MDT until June 27 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Haakon County in west central South Dakota... Southeastern Meade County in west central South Dakota... Northeastern Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 715 PM MDT. * At 614 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Creighton, or 37 miles west of Philip, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Creighton around 630 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Grindstone and Grindstone Butte. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
